name: the garden (itch) (lilshot)
description:
A short  game where you play as a mouse and your home was taken by cats. 

controls:  w,a,s,d to move. space to close text boxes.

if you like my game please donate every 5$ I make a new game. my patreon is https://www.patreon.com/lilshot

this  game was made in bitsy.
